comments:
Build ID: I20070208-0010

More information:
Might I get you to attach the workingsets.xml file in the <workspace>/.metadata/.plugins/org.eclipse.ui.workbench folder?  We can see if there is anything fishy with your working sets.

Created an attachment (id=59425)
workingsets.xml

Requested file.

Thanks for the file.  We should have things working better now (M6).

The problem that happened was other objects were included into the plug-in working set.  One was a resource and the other two were java elements.  Currently, when you use the 'add selected element to working set' action on the toolbar, PDE cannot support non-plug-in objects (like resources/java elements).  Fixing bug 173085 will fix this problem.
